Alain Bryan
Operations Manager, Strategy and Finance

Alain provides the operational management skills that John lacks, but he's also involved in the strategy side of things and his financial background allows him to oversee the finance and accounting functions.

Alain is very guarded and structured. He thrives in a structured environment where he can plan and analyze information. He enjoys being behind the scenes and does not need to be recognized for his efforts.
